page.title: 13RELIGION IN CASTLE VALE
page.content: CASTLE VALE HAS 3 CHURCHES,ALL OF THEM BUILT WITHIN THE LAST 2 YEARS.TOGETHER THEY HAVE A CONGREGATION OF ABOUT 600 PEOPLE,ALTHOUGH CASTLE VALE ITSELF HAS A POPULATION OF 25000.WE HAVE A CHURCH OF ENGLAND CALLED ST.CUTHBERTS WHICH WAS BUILT IN 1974.IT HAS 3 SERVICES ON SUNDAY AND A CONGREGATION OF 120 PEOPLE.IT HOLDS SEVERAL CLUBS FOR YOUNGSTERS AND MOTHERS.THE CHRISTIAN FELLOWSHIP HOLDS 2 SERVICES IN ST.CUTHBERTS CHURCH EVERY SUNDAY. THE SEVENTH DAY ADVENTISTS HOLD A SATURDAY SERVICE IN THE COMMUNITY CLUB. THE NEW TESTAMENT CHURCH OF GOD HAS A SMALL BUILDING AND HOLDS 3 SERVICES. THE CATHOLIC CHURCH IS CALLED ST.GERARDS AND WAS BUILT IN 1981.IT HAS A CHURCH ATTENDANCE OF 350 PEOPLE AND HOLDS 3 SERVICES ON SUNDAY.IT HOLDS SEVERAL CLUBS TOO.
